organisations.title: BJJ Organizations in Switzerland
organisations.description: Here you can find information about major BJJ organizations active in Switzerland. These organizations host competitions and events throughout the country and internationally.

ajp.description: A global professional jiu-jitsu organization founded by the UAE Jiu-Jitsu Federation. Known for organizing major tournaments like the Abu Dhabi World Professional Championship.

adcc.description: The most prestigious submission wrestling competition in the world. ADCC hosts the World Championships every two years, attracting the elite of grappling.

sbjjnf.description: The national federation governing Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu in Switzerland, organizing tournaments and promoting the sport throughout the country.

grapplingindustries.description: An international tournament series with a unique round-robin format. Known for their well-organized events across Europe, North America, and Australia.

contact.title: Let's Collaborate!
contact.intro: We're always looking to collaborate with members of the Swiss BJJ community! Whether you want to:
bulletPoints: Share your podcast or start a new one
Help build a directory of women brown & black belts in Switzerland
List yourself as a private BJJ coach
Suggest other ideas to grow the community
contact.formIntro: We'd love to hear from you! Please fill out the form below and we'll get back to you soon.
